Vista.The Shoppes at Carlsbad: The Shoppes at Carlsbad is a shopping mall in Carlsbad, California that is currently owned by Rouse Properties and had been known under several different names since it was first built in 1969 as Plaza Camino Real. Its anchor stores are JCPenney, Macy's (in two locations) and Sears. A Robinsons-May closed in 2006.
